programmes.show_description: 25 All-Killer 00s Dumbass Anthems! From Blink-182 and Wheatus to Fall Out Boy and Scouting For Girls.
Party pop rock anthems spanning 5 decades! From Queen, Kiss & Aerosmith to Blur, Paramore & The White Stripes.
Rounding off the week with rock classics and anthems! We guarantee AC/DC, Nirvana, Queen, Meat Loaf, Bon Jovi & much more!
An hour of rockin' chart toppers through the 70s with hits from Jimi Hendrix, Alice Cooper, Suzi Quatro and Queen.
Dust down your air guitar, cause we've 40 rock anthems from the 80s to strum along to! From AC/DC in 1980 to GN'R in 1989, via U2, Kiss, Toto, Springsteen and ZZ Top.
Rounding off the week with rock classics and anthems! We guarantee AC/DC, Nirvana, Queen, Meat Loaf, Bon Jovi & much more!
Nicky brings a masterclass in the most popular (& dangerous) subject in rock history! 20 songs loaded with lust, desire, breakups & despair - this is how love really does bite!
The Biggest Ballads from the royals of rock! From Queen, Bon Jovi & Whitesnake to Meat Loaf, Nickleback & Evanescence.
Who were the biggest superstar showoffs of the decade? Well how about Sting, Meatloaf, Iggy, Freddie, Geldof, Jagger, Rod and Daltrey for starters? But who's our No.1 rock frontman?
20 famous songs from The Rolling Stones' golden period - in order. Including classics like Jumpin' Jack Flash, Harlem Shuffle, It's All Over Now & Sympathy for the Devil.
Rounding off the week with rock classics and anthems! We guarantee AC/DC, Nirvana, Queen, Meat Loaf, Bon Jovi & much more!
30 years & 4 hours of classic rock bands, in order from 1965-1995! Expect to see The Stones, The Who, Joan Jett, Aerosmith, AC/DC, Queen, Genesis & The Beatles.
The legendary frontman of rock icons Deep Purple has handpicked 25 of the finest bands from the past six decades. It's classics all the way, so crank it up!
The legendary frontman of rock icons Deep Purple has handpicked 25 of the finest bands from the past six decades. It's classics all the way, so crank it up!
These are the legendary rock stars that made the 80s! Expect Meat Loaf, Bonnie Tyler, Queen, Bon Jovi, AC/DC, Iron Maiden & loads more!
Number 1 rock songs from the last 50 years! With mega hits from the Arctic Monkeys & KOL right back to legends like The Stones & T.Rex!
Turn it up to 11 for the finest rock anthems! Featuring Kings Of Leon, The Killers, Green Day, Biffy Clyro & The Foo Fighters. This is Now Rock!
A solid hour of guitar epics & crossover rock anthems from the 90s. From Alannah Miles in 1990 to Aerosmith in 1998.
A decade of mega hits and the loudest anthems! Expect Biffy Clyro, Linkin Park, Blink 182, Evanescence, Fall Out Boy & loads more!
From Peter Frampton and Free to Foreigner & Fleetwood Mac - the 70s was a feelgood and carefree time for pop and rock, and we bring back that vibe with 30 of the absolute best!
Number 1 rock songs from the last 50 years! With mega hits from the Arctic Monkeys & KOL right back to legends like The Stones & T.Rex!

programmes.show_name: Nicky Horne's Best Of British Rock
programmes.show_description: Nicky Horne's definitive 30 best British rock tracks from across the decades! Featuring Queen, Yes, Deep Purple, Motorhead, The Sex Pistols but who is the very best of British?
From Joy Division to The Stones, Zeppelin to Queen. Some of the best bands in the world came from right here in the UK!
From 2003 to 2015 - 30 minutes of the biggest rock songs from Muse!
Number 1 rock songs from the last 50 years! With mega hits from the Arctic Monkeys & KOL right back to legends like The Stones & T.Rex!
Starting in 1985, these are the power ladies who really rock! Expect Pink, Hayley Williams, Joan Jett, Sheryl Crow, Bonnie Tyler, Alanis Morissette & many more!
Turn it up to 11 for the finest rock anthems! Featuring Kings Of Leon, The Killers, Green Day, Biffy Clyro & The Foo Fighters. This is Now Rock!
In order, an hour of every song a number 1 rock song in the noughties!
25 All-Killer 00s Dumbass Anthems! From Blink-182 and Wheatus to Fall Out Boy and Scouting For Girls.
A decade of mega hits and the loudest anthems! Expect Biffy Clyro, Linkin Park, Blink 182, Evanescence, Fall Out Boy & loads more!
In reverse: Starting in 2015, we're going back 35 rock years of number 1 hit singles & albums!
